title: Jack Antonoff Takes A Break From fun. To Release 'Desire'
teaser: Jack Antonoff, lead guitarist for the band fun., wanted to break out on his own. Now he has â€” with his new band, Bleachers. NPR's Tamara Keith talks to him about the debut album, Strange Desire.
